ability.mkultra.skin_like_wood.name: Skin Like Wood
ability.mkultra.skin_like_wood.descripti: Hardens your skin, increasing your armor. Drains 1 mana for every hit you take.
ability.mkultra.natures_remedy.name: Nature's Remedy
ability.mkultra.natures_remedy.descripti: Heals your target for %s every second, lasts for %d seconds.
ability.mkultra.spirit_bomb.name: Spirit Bomb
ability.mkultra.spirit_bomb.description: Shoot a projectile that will explode after 2 seconds, dealing %s damage to enemies in the area.
ability.mkultra.cleansing_seed.name: Cleansing Seed
ability.mkultra.cleansing_seed.descripti: Shoot a projectile that removes negative effects from friends or deals %s damage to enemies.
ability.mkultra.explosive_growth.name: Explosive Growth
ability.mkultra.explosive_growth.descrip: Dash forward, damaging all enemies you hit for %s and casting Cleansing Seed and Nature's Remedy on your allies and yourself.
ability.mkultra.heal.name: Heal
ability.mkultra.smite.name: Smite
ability.mkultra.smite.description: Smites your target for %s and Stuns them for %d seconds.
ability.mkultra.power_word_summon.name: Power Word Summon
ability.mkultra.power_word_summon.descri: Summons your target in front of you, if they're an enemy roots them for %d seconds.
ability.mkultra.inspire.name: Inspire
ability.mkultra.inspire.description: Inspires your allies around you, granted them regeneration and haste for %d seconds.
ability.mkultra.galvanize.name: Galvanize
ability.mkultra.galvanize.description: Galvanizes your allies around you, curing their ill effects and granting them jump boost for %d seconds.
ability.mkultra.fire_armor.name: Fire Armor
ability.mkultra.fire_armor.description: Buffs your allies around you, providing Fire Resistance, Absorption, and a %.2f%% reduction in %s for %d seconds.
ability.mkultra.ember.name: Ember
ability.mkultra.ember.description: Deals %s to your target and causes them to burn for %s seconds, dealing %s damage every %d seconds.
ability.mkultra.ignite.name: Ignite
ability.mkultra.ignite.description: Ignites your target, dealing %s. If they are already burning, causes them to explode damaging nearby enemies within %.1f blocks and spreading the burn effect, if they're not burning causes them to burn.
ability.mkultra.warp_curse.name: Warp Curse
ability.mkultra.warp_curse.description: Curses your target, causing them to teleport a short distance and take %s every %d seconds and slowing them for %d seconds.
ability.mkultra.flame_wave.name: Flame Wave
ability.mkultra.flame_wave.description: A wave of fire engulfs your enemies, causing %s to each one. If the target is already burning damage is increased by %.2f%% and the target is withered for %d seconds.
ability.mkultra.fireball.name: Fireball
ability.mkultra.fireball.description: Throws a magical ball of fire, causing %s to enemies within %.1f blocks of its impact. Reduces target fire resistance by %.2f%% for %d seconds.
ability.mkultra.sever_tendon.name: Sever Tendon
ability.mkultra.sever_tendon.description: Deals %s to your target and causes them to bleed for %s seconds, dealing %s damage every %d seconds and reducing their movement speed by %.2f%%.
ability.mkultra.life_siphon.name: Life Siphon
ability.mkultra.life_siphon.description: Heals you for %s when you kill a target.
ability.mkultra.soul_drain.name: Soul Drain
ability.mkultra.soul_drain.description: Restores %.1f mana when you kill a target.
mkultra.talent_tree.core_talents.name: Core
faction.mkultra.green_knights.name: Green Knights
faction.mkultra.imperial_dead.name: Imperial Dead
mkultra.quest_reward.receive_item.name: You Will Receive a %s
ability.mkultra.whirlwind_blades.name: Whirlwind Blades
ability.mkultra.whirlwind_blades.descrip: Strikes all targets around you every %s seconds for %s seconds. Each hit increases the damage contribution from your weapon by %s, dealing from %s on first hit to %s damage on the last.
ability.mkultra.furious_brooding.name: Furious Brooding
ability.mkultra.furious_brooding.descrip: Restores %s health every second for %s seconds. Reduces your movement speed by %s.
ability.mkultra.yank.name: Yank
ability.mkultra.yank.description: Pulls the target towards you, applying %s force.
ability.mkultra.yaup.name: Yaup
ability.mkultra.yaup.description: Let loose a mighty yaup increases you and your allies' attack speed and strength for %s seconds.
ability.mkultra.stunning_shout.name: Stunning Shout
ability.mkultra.stunning_shout.descripti: Focuses your Pneuma into a mighty shout. Stunning for %s seconds and dealing %s to all enemies in a line.
ability.mkultra.wrath_beam.name: Wrath Beam
ability.mkultra.wrath_beam.description: Calls down a beam of energy dealing %s and applying Break Fire for %s seconds every %s seconds for %s seconds.
ability.mkultra.wrath_beam_flurry.name: Wrath Beam Flurry
mkultra.ability.flurry.description: Casts a %s on every enemy within %s blocks every %s seconds
mkultra.entitlement.cleric.tier_1.name: Cleric Tier 1
mkultra.entitlement.cleric.tier_2.name: Cleric Tier 2
mkultra.entitlement.cleric.tier_3.name: Cleric Tier 3
faction.mkultra.see_of_solang.name: See of Solang
faction.mkultra.nether_mages.name: Nether Mage's Guild
faction.mkultra.hyborean_dead.name: Hyborean Dead
ability.mkultra.shadow_pulse.name: Shadow Pulse
ability.mkultra.shadow_pulse.description: Summons a vortex of shadow with a radius of %s blocks, pulling nearby enemies in and dealing %s every %s seconds for %s seconds. When the effect ends, the vortex detonates dealing %s.
ability.mkultra.shadow_bolt.name: Shadow Bolt
ability.mkultra.shadow_bolt.description: Throws a magical ball of shadow, causing %s to the target.
ability.mkultra.engulfing_darkness.name: Engulfing Darkness
ability.mkultra.engulfing_darkness.descr: Conjures a magical darkness around the target, causing %s every %s seconds for %s seconds and slowing their movement. Every tick has a %s chance to grant the caster Shadowbringer for %s seconds. Shadowbringer causes your next Shadowbolt to have an instant cast time, 50%% of the mana cost, and instantly resets its cooldown.
ability.mkultra.life_spike.name: Life Spike
ability.mkultra.life_spike.description: Strikes the target with a blast of dark energy causing %s and transferring %s health to the caster.
faction.mkultra.necrotide_cultists.name: Necrotide Cultists
ability.mkultra.shadow_pulse_flurry.name: Shadow Pulse Flurry
ability.mkultra.seafury.name: Seafury
ability.mkultra.seafury.description: Places a line of %s eruptions down at the target position %s blocks apart, causing %s after %s seconds to targets within %s blocks.
ability.mkultra.green_soul.name: Green Soul
ability.mkultra.green_soul.description: Infuses you with the indomitable spirit of a Green Knight, increasing health and armor.
mkultra.talent.green_soul.name: Green Soul
mkultra.talent.green_soul.description: Grants the Green Soul passive ability.
mkultra.talent.soul_drain.name: Soul Drain
mkultra.talent.soul_drain.description: Grants the Soul Drain passive ability.
mkultra.talent.life_siphon.name: Life Siphon
mkultra.talent.life_siphon.description: Grants the Life Siphon passive ability.
ability.mkultra.frozen_grasp.name: Frozen Grasp
ability.mkultra.frozen_grasp.description: Causes your next %s hits to slow the targets casting, attack, and movement speed for %s seconds.
ability.mkultra.drown.name: Drown
ability.mkultra.drown.description: Fills the targets lungs with water dealing %s every %s seconds for %s seconds.
ability.mkultra.holy_word.name: Holy Word
ability.mkultra.holy_word.description: Strikes the target with the word of God, dealing %s and applying a stack of %s lasting %s seconds, when %s stacks are reached, stuns the target for %s seconds.
